item.title: The Modern Renaissance Man
item.description: I have been dealing with the macro-questions of life and how I’d like to live mine “well”. Some of the answers are found in the books, but some remain un-answered because of their specificity. Today, I met Shubhouy, someone who I’d say has “seen things”, being a triple masters and worked numerous roles. In a conversation I was delighted to have, I found some answers and direction to life I was looking for.
